body_html: Can you try with the latest version of Eigen (version 3f47637d1e7c1) ? I just fixed a potential issue in the implementation of the evaluator of the scan operation that may result in dangling references once the evaluator is copied.
body_text: Can you try with the latest version of Eigen (version 3f47637d1e7c1) ? I just fixed a potential issue in the implementation of the evaluator of the scan operation that may result in dangling references once the evaluator is copied.
body: Can you try with the latest version of Eigen (version [3f47637d1e7c1](https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/commits/3f47637d1e7c199b10c66bf1f8d3bf046e479d26)) ? I just fixed a potential issue in the implementation of the evaluator of the scan operation that may result in dangling references once the evaluator is copied.
